price: Cyangwa bibwira ko bafite ibigega bya Nyagasani wawe? Cyangwa ni bo bagenga (b’isi, bakora ibyo bashaka)?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
